channel.title: Adding Right Click Options to NPCs?
channel.description: How do I add extra options to an NPC for instance, I want to add another option to a banker on my server besides 'Talk to' and 'Bank' how do I do this?

item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

How do I add extra options to an NPC for instance, I want to add another option to a banker on my server besides ‘Talk to’ and ‘Bank’ how do I do this?
